title: Another Instance is Running?
body: So when i log off league i come back after a while and want to start playing again , but i get Another Instance is Running even doe i checked on my task manager that league exe is shut down , do any of you know how i can fix this?

replies.body: Your security settings through your OS or some program may be blocking the client from launching.  Go through the list of steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your setting sand allow access.  That should do the trick, but let me know if you have any questions.
